thread.title: Do not delay, book the Hotel Relais Bosquet!
thread.title_full: Do not delay, book the Hotel Relais Bosquet! - Review of Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mpopkin
title: Do not delay, book the Hotel Relais Bosquet!
text:
I just spent another great five days in Paris staying at my favorite hotel, the Hotel Relais Bosquet! They offer a nice Facebook rate and I had a superior room for 122 euros plus breakfast! The rooms are huge by European standards! I usually get a room facing the street with an Eiffel Tower view, but this time I preferred a room at the back of the hotel which was very quiet! Abendour and Christian and the rest of the staff are always so accommodating, they make you feel at home and go out of their way for all guest's needs! You can't beat the location, a two minute walk to the rue Cler with its shops and restaurants, and a five minute walk to the Ecole Militaire Metro station! It is my go to hotel when in the city of lights! Merci HRB!
Room Tip: Rooms in the back are quieter but you will love looking at the Eiffel Tower sparkle at night if you... See more room tips
